tasks.name: Implicit Emotion Processing Task
tasks.definition: Participants were presented with face stimuli from a standard set of black-and-white images displaying seven basic emotions. They performed a gender identification task while undergoing fMRI and eyetracking.

tasks.name: Explicit Emotion Identification Task
tasks.definition: Participants were shown face stimuli from the same set as in the implicit task. They were asked to identify the emotion displayed in each face from a list of all emotions.
